member.name: T:TCPConManageDll.TCPConnectionManager
member.summary: Show which connections are using a specified port, and release that port by terminating applications using it.

member.name: M:TCPConManageDll.TCPConnectionManager.getTCpConnections(System.Int32)
member.summary: Show which connections are using a specified port.

member.name: M:TCPConManageDll.TCPConnectionManager.TerminateTCPConnections(System.Int32)
member.summary: Release a specified port by terminating applications using it. This function needs admin privilege for each termination.
